subtitle: This dish can be seved as an accompaniment to meat or fish - but is tasty enough to eat on its own.

method.text: Heat 15 ml of the oil in a frying pan. Add the onoins. Fry for 5 min until soft golden brown. Remove from the heat. Stir in the thyme, garlic, olives, tomatoes and seasoning.
Pour 30 ml of the oil in the base of a shallow ovenproof baking dish. Add half the onion mixture.
Arrange half the potato slices on top. Sprinkle over half the cheese. Repeat the layers, using remaining ingredients.
Drizzle over the remaining oil. Cover with foil. Cook for 10 min. Remove foil and cook for a further 10 min. Serve.

title: Potato gratin with tomatoes and olives
